news.title: South Korea's Hyundai to announce $20 billion U.S. investment
news.summary: Hyundai is the latest major international conglomerate to announce investments ahead of Trump's April 2 tariff deadline. The South Korean company is one of the world's largest automakers.

news.title: Tax revenue collected by the IRS set to plummet, report says
news.summary: IRS officials are expecting tax revenue to drop by more than 10% by April 15, the Washington Post reported. The IRS is expected to collect $1.2 trillion in tax revenue this year.

news.title: 23andMe files for bankruptcy, Anne Wojcicki steps down as CEO
news.summary: Anne Wojcicki has resigned from her role as chief executive effective immediately. She will remain a member of the board, though she will not be on the executive committee.

news.title: Google's $32 billion Wiz deal may signal a turning point for slow IPO, M&A markets
news.summary: Google's $32 billion acquisition of Wiz may signal the start of a friendlier initial public offering and deal activity environment. Google bought Wiz for more than $30 billion.

news.title: United Airlines is raising annual fees for lounges and rewards credit cards. Here's what you need to know
news.summary: United is raising annual fees on lounge memberships and credit cards. United is raising Annual Fees on Lounge Memberships and Credit Cards. United will also be raising Annual fees on Club Memberships.
